JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to be their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us achieve our mission. The HR Business Insights (HRBI) team drives data-based decisions to tackle strategic challenges and opportunities at Microsoft. We partner with HR Leaders and Business Leaders to help shape the workforce of the future. Our team advises HR through data-based insights and compelling storytelling to achieve business objectives and people priorities, enables deep insights for the HR partners supporting key people and organization decisions and initiatives, and partners to grow data capability and enable modern data solutions that increase HR’s impact through leveraging data. The ideal candidate is comfortable in a fast-paced environment and capable of juggling multiple initiatives simultaneously often with short time constraints. They can flex and reprioritize to adjust to changing business conditions. They have a background working with BI tools, developing visualizations and effective story telling using data and insights. They are comfortable communicating with individuals with technical backgrounds including engineering project managers, software engineers and solution architects. Modernize the current reporting infrastructure leveraging latest and advanced features of Power BI focusing on bringing artificial intelligence capabilities to the platform. Stay connected with product groups/feature crews and be on know about latest capabilities, features and technology updates on the product roadmap.
